title: IBACnetServer (Interface)
text:
INTERFACE PUBLIC IBACnetServer EXTENDS IBACnetEmpty,
IBACnetEventConsumer
Interface implemented by a BACnet server used out of this library. See documentation of
BACnetServer
for details.
